page.title: 20SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: MOST PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN SHROTON APPRECIATE ITS PEACE AND BEAUTY AND HAVING FRIENDLY NEIGHBOURS. EVEN THOSE WHO HAVE RECENTLY MOVED INTO THE NEW HOUSES ARE CONCERNED THAT THERE SHOULD NOT BE ANY MORE BUILDING IN CASE THE CHARACTER OF THE VILLAGE CHANGES. THERE IS SOME FEAR AMONG THE OLDER RESIDENTS THAT THE ARRIVAL OF RETIRED PEOPLE FROM MORE EXPENSIVE PARTS OF THE COUNTRY WILL FORCE HOUSE PRICES UP SO THAT LOCAL PEOPLE WILL NOT BE ABLE TO AFFORD TO LIVE HERE. THEY DO NOT WANT ANY MORE HOUSES TO BECOME HOLIDAY COTTAGES. THEY ARE SAD THAT THEY DO NOT HAVE THERE OWN PARSON OR A SCHOOL. *********** THIS SURVEY WAS MADE BY THE YOUNGER GIRLS (2ND, LOWER 3RD, UPPER 3RD FORMS) OF{CROFT HOUSE,}A BOARDING SCHOOL FOR ABOUT 200 GIRLS AT SHILLINGSTONE, 4 MILES FROM SHROTON.
